des: "This is really similar to the brand OregonÂ® Chai. Simply delicious either hot or iced! This will save you more money than buying the chai. In India, each family has their own way of making it, so you should experiment to find your favorite blend."
ins:
Pour boiling water over tea bag in a mug; let steep 4 to 6 minutes. Remove and discard tea bag.
Stir honey and sugar into tea to dissolve. Stir milk through tea to serve.
